
ExpertXLS Excel Library
=======================

Thanks for trying ExpertXLS Excel Library.
At least .NET Framework 2.0 is required to be able to use it.
The component also works with .NET 3.0, .NET 3.5 (Visual Studio 2008), .NET 4.0 (Visual Studio 2010) and .NET 4.5 (Visual Studio 2012/2013/2015).


In the archive you have downloaded you will find:

Bin/expertxls.dll - this is the dll you will use in your applications (CLR 2)
Bin/.NET_4.0/expertxls.dll - this is the dll you will use in your applications for .NET 4.0 and above (CLR 4)

Doc/ExpertXLS-API.chm - API reference and developers' guide

Samples/ - folder containing samples for ASP.NET, WinForms in C# or VB.NET for Visual Studio 2008 and 2005 (.NET 3.5 and .NET 2.0)
Samples_NET_4.0/ - folder containing samples for ASP.NET, WinForms in C# or VB.NET for Visual Studio 2010, 2012 and 2013 (.NET 4.0, .NET 4.5 and .NET 4.5.1)


For additional support and documentation:
http://www.html-to-pdf.net/excel-library.aspx
http://www.html-to-pdf.net/Support.aspx
http://www.html-to-pdf.net/FAQ.aspx


Getting started
---------------

1. Add expertxls.dll to the bin folder of your application
2. Add a reference in the project to expertxls.dll.
3. Write your code (see the samples and the API reference for help).

Licensing
---------

A serial number will be emailed to you upon purchasing. To unlock the product, you need to set in your code the serial number, like this:

xlsWorkbook.LicenseKey = "put your serial number here";


Support
-------

For any problems, contact us: office@html-to-pdf.net

http://www.html-to-pdf.net/excel-library.aspx
